text: @BorisJohnson My mother lives at that home.  She would have been horrified at you "visiting".  She should never have caught COVID19 there, but she did, because the protection of care homes has been a shambles as has your handling of this whole crisis.  You have NOTHING to be proud of.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden
